snippet: Theatrical productions in Chicago featuring funny nuns have raised more than $2 million for Roman Catholic Sisters.
abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column describes how Chicago playwright Vicki Quade, who has written five theatrical comedies featuring funny nuns, now uses her shows to raise money for Catholic sisters.
lead_paragraph: Theatrical productions in Chicago featuring funny nuns have raised more than $2 million for Roman Catholic Sisters.

headline.print_headline: Poking Fun At Nuns Onstage, With Big Returns
headline.seo: Chicago Play ‘Late Nite Catechism’ Pokes Fun at Nuns, With Big Returns
headline.main: Poking Fun at Nuns Onstage, With Big Returns
